title: Sikkim
description: Recharge and rejuvenate your mind and body amidst the tranquility and beauty of the Himalayan Mountains

title: North East
description: Seven Sisters. Known for its natural beauty, diversity, rare and unique wildlife, people and culture

title: Kerala
description: Paradise, Beautiful backwaters, Varied demography, Unique culture, and Traditions. Peace of mind.

title: Rajasthan
description: Visit Majestic forts, Thar desert, Beautifully build temples, lakes, and Royalty.

title: Gujarat
description: Enjoy its unity rich cultural heritage, especially dance (garba and dandiya raas) and food (dhokla, fafda, khakra, etc.)

title: Bhutan
description: Natural beauty, Forest conservation, Gross national happiness, Great culture, Heritage, and Biodiversity
